channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Centrist wins Romania's tense presidential race over hard-right nationalist
item.description: A huge turnout Sunday played a key role in the tense election that many viewed as a geopolitical choice between East or West.
item.content:encoded:
A huge turnout Sunday played a key role in the tense election that many viewed as a geopolitical choice between East or West.

(Image credit: Vadim Ghirda)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Former President Joe Biden diagnosed with prostate cancer
item.description: Biden has been diagnosed with prostate cancer, which has metastasized to the bone, according to a statement from his personal office.
item.content:encoded:
Biden has been diagnosed with prostate cancer, which has metastasized to the bone, according to a statement from his personal office.

(Image credit: Samuel Corum)
item.dc:creator: Luke Garrett

item.title: FBI says primary suspect in Calif. fertility clinic bombing likely died in the blast
item.description: Investigators have identified Guy Edward Bartkus, 25, as the primary suspect in the explosion that injured four others.
item.content:encoded:
Investigators have identified Guy Edward Bartkus, 25, as the primary suspect in the explosion that injured four others.

(Image credit: Eric Thayer)
item.dc:creator: Joe Hernandez

item.title: SNL's 50th season proved it's still relevant. Can it stay that way?
item.description: The season finale, with host Scarlett Johansson and musical guest Bad Bunny, didn't give any answers about rumored cast departures.
item.content:encoded:
The season finale, with host Scarlett Johansson and musical guest Bad Bunny, didn't give any answers about rumored cast departures.

(Image credit: Will Heath)
item.dc:creator: Eric Deggans

item.title: Zelenskyy meets Vance in Rome, hours after Russia's largest drone attack on Ukraine
item.description: The intensified diplomacy came as Russia launched its largest drone barrage against Ukraine since the start of the full-scale invasion in 2022.
item.content:encoded:
The intensified diplomacy came as Russia launched its largest drone barrage against Ukraine since the start of the full-scale invasion in 2022.

(Image credit: AP)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: These Democratic governors are trying to curb health care for unauthorized immigrants
item.description: After expanding state Medicaid programs to cover people in the country without legal status, Democrats are considering changes that would reduce immigrant access.
item.content:encoded:
After expanding state Medicaid programs to cover people in the country without legal status, Democrats are considering changes that would reduce immigrant access.

(Image credit: Rich Pedroncelli)
item.dc:creator: Dana Ferguson

item.title: Israel holds ceasefire talks with Hamas, as new ground operation in Gaza begins
item.description: Israel and Hamas have entered the most substantive negotiations in months in Qatar. The talks come amid intense Israeli airstrikes that have killed more than 500 Palestinians in the past five days.
item.content:encoded:
Israel and Hamas have entered the most substantive negotiations in months in Qatar. The talks come amid intense Israeli airstrikes that have killed more than 500 Palestinians in the past five days.

(Image credit: Ariel Schalit)
item.dc:creator: Daniel Estrin

item.title: Losing faith: Rural religious colleges are among the most endangered
item.description: Some religious colleges and universities are cutting programs. Others are seeking mergers to reduce costs and expand offerings.
item.content:encoded:
Some religious colleges and universities are cutting programs. Others are seeking mergers to reduce costs and expand offerings.

(Image credit: Mike Rundle for The Hechinger Report)
item.dc:creator: Jon Marcus

item.title: A study finds stacking bricks differently could help this country fight air pollution
item.description: Bangladesh suffers from extreme air pollution, but a new study shows the brick industry can make small changes to have a big effect on the country's smog problem.
item.content:encoded:
Bangladesh suffers from extreme air pollution, but a new study shows the brick industry can make small changes to have a big effect on the country's smog problem.

(Image credit: Ahmed Salahuddin/NurPhoto via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Lambert

item.title: Poles vote for a new president as security concerns loom large
item.description: The vote comes amid rising security fears over the war in neighboring Ukraine and uncertainty about continued U.S. support for Europe's defense.
item.content:encoded:
The vote comes amid rising security fears over the war in neighboring Ukraine and uncertainty about continued U.S. support for Europe's defense.

(Image credit: Czarek Sokolowski)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press
